p: Throughout the past few decades, many exotic plants invaded large areas in Saudi Arabia, particularly in the southwestern region, where ≈ 74% species of the flora exist ( Thomas et al., 2016). N. glauca is one of the major invaders in Suadi Arabia, where it grows in high altitude areas between 800 and 2700 m.a.s.l. and invade new habitats ( Thomas et al., 2016).
